item.description:
It's super early - but I know there are other early bird hikers out there...

For those who are addicted to hiking and need a mid-week fix, join me for an invigorating early morning hike in the Fells. A friend of mine once said that the Fells look, feel and sound different in the early morning hours - once you experience it, you'll be hooked.  He's right!

What's the plan?

We will do the entire Skyline trail at the Middlesex Fells,  approximately a 7.2 mile hike. Our path will include a number of steeper ascents, rough broken ground, and rock scrambles. Elevation gain for the hike will be approximately 1,300 ft. 

We will hike at a fast pace - 3+mph - with the goal to finish in 2 hours 30 min or less. You don't need to be an experienced hiker to join, but excellent cardio fitness is REQUIRED for this hike.  This is an endurance building hike, we will push hard... if you come out to join us, please set your expectations accordingly.

 

Where will we meet?

We're meeting  NEAR the Long Pond Parking (gate 13) on South Border Rd since the gates are likely still locked/closed at that hour. We'll park at the pull-off just south of the Long Pond Parking lot. The approximate address (use your GPS) is 456 South Border Road, Winchester, MA.  Heading north on South Border Rd (from Exit 33 on I-93), you'll go about 1.5 miles. You'll pass Leslie Rd on your left shortly before the pull off (on your right). If you get to the gated Long Pond Parking (on your right) you've gone too far. Please be on time - most of us have to get to work eventually and if we start late, we'll finish late and mess up our schedules. I'll leave the lot promptly at 5:05am. 

What should I bring?

- Water - minimum 1 liter, recommend 2 liters for a longer hike like this

- Good hiking shoes/trail runners

- Bug spray

- Headlamp - we're starting early it will probably not be fully light at 5am.

More Info:

Rain will cancel - I'll send out an email (with my cell phone number) to confirmed participants the night before the hike to confirm details.

You can find out more information about the Fells here: http://www.fells.org/visit/

And you can print out free maps here: http://www.fellsbiker.com/maps

Map view of parking area:   Parking
item.how_to_find_us: Red Toyota Matrix (in the parking area just SOUTH of the gated Long Pond Parking Lot)
item.name: Early Morning Hike - Hike the entire Skyline Trail at Middlesex Fells
